name: 楊元森
objective: This course is intended to provide the students with theory and application of structural analysis as applies to trusses, beams, and frames. This semester of this course focuses on analysis of statically determinate structures.
schedule:
W01: Types of structures and loads
W02: Basic analysis of statically determinate structures
W03-04: Statically determinate trusses 
W05-06: Internal loadings developed in structural members
W07-08: Influence lines of statically determinate structures
W09: Midterm
W10: Elastic beam theory
W11: Double integration method
W12: Conjugate-beam method
W13-16: Deflections using energy methods
W17: Review of statically determinate structural deflections  
W18: Final examination 
W15:
scorePolicy:
Attendance, quiz, lecture activity: 20% +/- 5%
Midterm: 30% +/- 5%
Final Exam.: 50% +/- 10%
materials: R. C. Hibbeler (2020). Structural Analysis 10ed. ISBN: 978-1-292-24713-7 (http://www.gau-lih.com.tw/tier/front/bin/ptdetail.phtml?Part=VX0417&Category=0)
remarks:
本學期原則採實體授課方式； 因應疫情警戒標準，本學期教學及授課方式請依照學校網頁所公布之訊息為準： (https://oaa.ntut.edu.tw/p/404-1008-98622.php?Lang=zh-tw)
In case of COVID-19 level 3 pandemic alert, the lecture will try to carry out the midterm and final examination online through Google Meet with all attendees' webcam on. The online examination will be close book.
